content: The Gold Ridge Beast is one of the Treasures in Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike other Crafting Materials, this can be sold as soon as you get it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Ridge_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Ridge Beast'.
The content is as follows:
The Gold Ridge Beast is one of the Treasures in Black Myth: Wukong. Unlike other Crafting Materials, this can be sold as soon as you get it.
